name: SemanticCache
description: Caches API responses based on semantic similarity, reducing redundant processing and improving performance.

policyAttributes.name: name
policyAttributes.description: The name of the semantic cache policy. Used for tracking and referencing this policy instance.

policyAttributes.name: threshold
policyAttributes.description: The maximum distance threshold value for the semantic cache.

policyAttributes.name: jsonPath
policyAttributes.description: The JSONPath expression used to extract content from the payload. If not specified, the entire payload will be used for validation.
